content: Is there a recommended way to build old versions of rustc? I tried git checkout 1.53.0 && git submodule sync && git submodule update and ./x.py build but then I get The requested URL returned error: 404 when curl tries to download https://ci-artifacts.rust-lang.org/rustc-builds/82b86216422e1ee696e20511180fada7a7a87949/rust-dev-nightly-x86_64-apple-darwin.tar.xz .
you likely want to disable download-ci-llvm or something like that in config.toml
